template.template: SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0
template.name: SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0

item.name: WAN actual egress traffic
item.description: Ingoing data transfer rate in bytes per second.

item.name: LAN1 actual egress traffic
item.description: Physical network interface description. LAN1 is electrical, LAN2 and LAN3 are SFP, WAN is radio port and MNG is internal management interface.

item.name: MNG actual egress traffic
item.description: Outgoing data transfer rate in bytes per second.

trigger.expression: max(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/icmpping,#3)=0
trigger.name: Unavailable by ICMP ping
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Last three attempts returned timeout. Please check device connectivity.

trigger.expression: min(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/icmppingloss,5m)>{$ICMP_LOSS_WARN} and min(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/icmppingloss,5m)<100
trigger.name: High ICMP ping loss

dependency.name: Unavailable by ICMP ping
dependency.expression: max(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/icmpping,#3)=0

trigger.expression: avg(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/icmppingsec,5m)>{$ICMP_RESPONSE_TIME_WARN}
trigger.name: High ICMP ping response time

dependency.name: High ICMP ping loss
dependency.expression: min(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/icmppingloss,5m)>{$ICMP_LOSS_WARN} and min(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/icmppingloss,5m)<100

dependency.name: Unavailable by ICMP ping
dependency.expression: max(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/icmpping,#3)=0

trigger.expression: avg(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/icmppingsec,5m)>{$ICMP_RESPONSE_TIME_WARN}
trigger.name: Integra E High ICMP ping response time

dependency.name: High ICMP ping loss
dependency.expression: min(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/icmppingloss,5m)>{$ICMP_LOSS_WARN} and min(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/icmppingloss,5m)<100

dependency.name: Unavailable by ICMP ping
dependency.expression: max(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/icmpping,#3)=0

item.name: LAN2 actual ingress traffic
item.description: Ingoing data transfer rate in bytes per second.

item.name: LAN3 actual ingress traffic
item.description: Ingoing data transfer rate in bytes per second.

item.name: MNG actual ingress traffic
item.description: Ingoing data transfer rate in bytes per second.

item.name: WAN actual ingress traffic
item.description: Ingoing data transfer rate in bytes per second.

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraBradioTxMute)=1 or last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraBradioTxMute)=3
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraBradioTxMute)=2
trigger.name: Radio muted

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraBsysDeviceSerial,#1)<>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraBsysDeviceSerial,#2)
trigger.name: Radio HW changed

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraBsystemServicesFwCurrInfo,#1)<>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraBsystemServicesFwCurrInfo,#2)
trigger.name: FW changed

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraGifPortAdminStatus_LAN1)=2
trigger.name: LAN1 Port disabled

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraGifPortAdminStatus_LAN2)=2
trigger.name: LAN2 Port disabled

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraGifPortAdminStatus_LAN3)=2
trigger.name: LAN3 Port disabled

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/LAN1_integraGifPortHighSpeed,#1)<>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/LAN1_integraGifPortHighSpeed,#2)
trigger.name: LAN1 Port Speed changed

item.name: LAN1 Operational Status
item.description: Actual state of interfaces. Link can be up(1), down(2) or in unknown(3) state.

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/LAN1_integraGifPortOperStatus)=2 or last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/LAN1_integraGifPortOperStatus)=3
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/LAN1_integraGifPortOperStatus)=1
trigger.name: LAN1 Port down

dependency.name: LAN1 Port disabled
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraGifPortAdminStatus_LAN1)=2

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/LAN2_integraGifPortHighSpeed,#1)<>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/LAN2_integraGifPortHighSpeed,#2)
trigger.name: LAN2 Port Speed changed

item.name: LAN2 Operational Status
item.description: Actual state of interfaces. Link can be up(1), down(2) or in unknown(3) state.

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/LAN2_integraGifPortOperStatus)=2 or last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/LAN2_integraGifPortOperStatus)=3
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/LAN2_integraGifPortOperStatus)=1
trigger.name: LAN2 Port down

dependency.name: LAN2 Port disabled
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraGifPortAdminStatus_LAN2)=2

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/LAN3_integraGifPortHighSpeed,#1)<>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/LAN3_integraGifPortHighSpeed,#2)
trigger.name: LAN3 Port Speed changed

item.name: LAN3 Operational Status
item.description: Actual state of interfaces. Link can be up(1), down(2) or in unknown(3) state.

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/LAN3_integraGifPortOperStatus)=2 or last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/LAN3_integraGifPortOperStatus)=3
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/LAN3_integraGifPortOperStatus)=1
trigger.name: LAN3 Port down

dependency.name: LAN3 Port disabled
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraGifPortAdminStatus_LAN3)=2

item.name: Max. capacity Rx available
item.description: Rx ethernet capacity in kilobits per second

item.name: Max. capacity Tx available
item.description: Tx ethernet capacity in kilobits per second

item.name: Data Acquire status
item.description: This is the current status of modem data acquire when queried modem status.

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemAcquireStatus)="1|3"
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemAcquireStatus)=2
trigger.name: Modem not locked

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemBackgroundBlockError)<>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemBackgroundBlockError,#2)
trigger.name: BBE increased

dependency.name: Modem not locked
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemAcquireStatus)="1|3"
dependency.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemAcquireStatus)=2

dependency.name: PLL status error
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBradioPLL)=1
dependency.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBradioPLL)=2

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemCarrierOffset)<=-250000 or last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemCarrierOffset)>=250000
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemCarrierOffset)>-250000 or last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemCarrierOffset)<250000
trigger.name: Radio carrier offset alarm

dependency.name: Modem not locked
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemAcquireStatus)="1|3"
dependency.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemAcquireStatus)=2

dependency.name: PLL status error
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBradioPLL)=1
dependency.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBradioPLL)=2

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemErroredBlock)<>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemErroredBlock,#2)
trigger.name: Errored block increased

dependency.name: Modem not locked
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemAcquireStatus)="1|3"
dependency.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemAcquireStatus)=2

dependency.name: PLL status error
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBradioPLL)=1
dependency.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBradioPLL)=2

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemErroredSecond)<>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemErroredSecond,#2)
trigger.name: Errored seconds increased

dependency.name: Modem not locked
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemAcquireStatus)="1|3"
dependency.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemAcquireStatus)=2

dependency.name: PLL status error
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBradioPLL)=1
dependency.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBradioPLL)=2

item.name: FEC load
item.description: Decoder stress or FEC load value

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemFECload)>={$FECLOADMAX}
trigger.name: FEC load increased

dependency.name: Modem not locked
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemAcquireStatus)="1|3"
dependency.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemAcquireStatus)=2

dependency.name: PLL status error
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBradioPLL)=1
dependency.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBradioPLL)=2

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemRadialMse)>={$MSEMIN}
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemRadialMse)<{$MSEMIN}
trigger.name: Radial MSE alarm

dependency.name: Modem not locked
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemAcquireStatus)="1|3"
dependency.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemAcquireStatus)=2

dependency.name: PLL status error
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBradioPLL)=1
dependency.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBradioPLL)=2

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemSeverelyErroredSecond)<>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemSeverelyErroredSecond,#2)
trigger.name: Severely errored seconds increased

dependency.name: Modem not locked
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemAcquireStatus)="1|3"
dependency.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemAcquireStatus)=2

dependency.name: PLL status error
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBradioPLL)=1
dependency.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBradioPLL)=2

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemTemperature),{$TEMPMIN},{$TEMPMAX100})=0
trigger.name: Modem temperature alarm

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBradioPLL)=1
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBradioPLL)=2
trigger.name: PLL status error

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBradioRxLevel),{$RXLEVMIN},{$RXLEVMAX})=0
trigger.name: Rx level alarm

dependency.name: Modem not locked
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemAcquireStatus)="1|3"
dependency.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemAcquireStatus)=2

dependency.name: PLL status error
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBradioPLL)=1
dependency.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBradioPLL)=2

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBradioTemperature),{$TEMPMIN},{$TEMPMAX80})=0
trigger.name: Radio temperature alarm

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBsysBoardTemperature),{$TEMPMIN},{$TEMPMAX100})=0
trigger.name: System temperature alarm

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBsysCPUtemperature),{$TEMPMIN},{$TEMPMAX100})=0
trigger.name: System CPU temperature alarm

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBsysLicenseGenStatus)=4
trigger.name: License unlimited

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBsysPSUcurrent),{$PSUCURRMIN},{$PSUCURRMAX})=0
trigger.name: PSU current alarm

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBsysPSUpower),{$PSUPOWMIN},{$PSUPOWMAX})=0
trigger.name: PSU power alarm

trigger.expression: between(last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBsysPSUvoltage),{$PSUVOLTMIN},{$PSUVOLTMAX})=0
trigger.name: PSU voltage alarm

trigger.expression: max(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/zabbix[host,snmp,available],{$SNMP.TIMEOUT})=0
trigger.name: No SNMP data collection
trigger.description: SNMP is not available for polling. Please check device connectivity and SNMP settings.

dependency.name: Unavailable by ICMP ping
dependency.expression: max(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/icmpping,#3)=0

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBsysLicenseGenStatus)=2 or last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBsysLicenseGenStatus)=3 or last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraBsysLicenseExpire)<1209600
trigger.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBsysLicenseGenStatus)=1 or last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/integraBsysLicenseExpire)>=1209600
trigger.name: License alarm

dependency.name: License unlimited
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBsysLicenseGenStatus)=4

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemModulation)<>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemRxModulation)
trigger.name: RX modulation different than maximal

dependency.name: Modem not locked
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemAcquireStatus)="1|3"
dependency.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemAcquireStatus)=2

dependency.name: PLL status error
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBradioPLL)=1
dependency.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBradioPLL)=2

trigger.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemModulation)<>last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemTxModulation)
trigger.name: TX modulation different than maximal

dependency.name: Modem not locked
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemAcquireStatus)="1|3"
dependency.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBmodemAcquireStatus)=2

dependency.name: PLL status error
dependency.expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBradioPLL)=1
dependency.recovery_expression: last(/SAF BASIC Integra-G template V30 for Zabbix 7.0/SAF-INTEGRAB-MIB_integraBradioPLL)=2
